endpoints.description: Submit operational data for an environmental impact assessment.
Retrieve the environmental impact scores for a specific assessment.
Update the operational data for an existing environmental impact assessment.
Delete a previously submitted environmental impact assessment.
Submit hypothetical operational data to estimate potential environmental impacts.
Retrieve tailored mitigation recommendations based on an assessment.
Access data on resource usage across different operational activities.
Obtain detailed emission reports related to a specific assessment.
View the history of all assessments performed by the user.
Modify the review status of a specific assessment.
